11.title: THE SHAKESPEAREAN ROOM
clues: (Wolf Blitzer delivers the clue from the Shakespearean Room.)  Confrontation at Elsinore Castle.  Laertes wishes vengeance for his father's death in this play, & the King says yes to those demands
